heading: small world
subheading: the 6-year-old survivor of a cuban shipwreck spent sunday at walt disney world, apparently unaware of the politically charged custody battle surrounding him. elian gonzalez got a hug from mickey mouse, but he was anxious about boarding a boat ride, asking whether the boat would sink. the boy's mother and stepfather drowned when a boatload of illegal immigrants capsized. elian's father wants the boy returned to cuba -- and so does president fidel castro. elian's relatives in miami want him to remain in the united states.
author: wired staff
text: the 6-year-old survivor of a cuban shipwreck spent sunday at walt disney world, apparently unaware of the politically charged custody battle surrounding him. elian gonzalez got a hug from mickey mouse, but he was anxious about boarding a boat ride, asking whether the boat would sink. the boy's mother and stepfather drowned when a boatload of illegal immigrants capsized. elian's father wants the boy returned to cuba -- and so does president fidel castro. elian's relatives in miami want him to remain in the united states.
